Text.Value: W-wha...? You killed them...?

EditorData.NodeContext: Alarm and incredulity. He's just learned his back-up isn't coming, and that this intruder uncannily pointed to his unspoken fear (because they read his mind and used his worries against him).

Text.Value: Look out! Someone's comin' from the crypt!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Notices the players exiting from the crypt.
EditorData.NodeContext: An urgent call - alerting comrades to an intruder. *match VO and acting length between actors*

Text.Value: Attack.
It's mine now. Leave, before things get ugly.
You have awoken me from my slumber - now I crave your blood!
C-c'mon, you lot, let's get out of here!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Gimblebock addresses his minions, telling them to flee.
EditorData.NodeContext: Nerves showing a little as he orders his underlings to retreat. He's bottled it.

Text.Value: Look out! Someone's comin' from the crypt!
What...? Get out of my head!

EditorData.NodeContext: Instant alarm and anger - realising the player is trying to read his mind.

Text.Value: You have awoken me from my slumber - now I crave your blood!
Where are the others? Mari, Barton? Did he kill them...?
Where are the others? Mari, Barton? Did she kill them...?
Where are the others? Mari, Barton? Did they kill them...?

EditorData.NodeContext: Tense, a little worried. Could this intruder have the upper hand? Gimblebock's internal thought, being eavesdropped upon by the player.

Text.Value: Look out! Someone's comin' from the crypt!
Mine now. Leave.
Now we're going to - Wait! Who're you? And how did you get in there?!

EditorData.CinematicNodeContext: Giimblebock addresses his nearby minions - but turns to you when he realises you're near.
EditorData.NodeContext: Cut off mid sentence by the realisation that the player is nearby. Challenges them. They just appeared through a door that was supposedly secure.
EditorData.StateChangeTags: Gimblebock turns to face the player

Text.Value: ...You're both twice as tall as me but have half the bloody backbone!

EditorData.NodeContext: Angry, domineering. Short-tempered gang boss berating his underling's caution.

Text.Value: Whoever was flying that thing can't have survived - whatever's left is up for grabs!
Rubbish! Kill him!
Rubbish! Kill her!
Rubbish! Kill them!

EditorData.NodeContext: Bluster and hostility. He was unconvinced by the player's attempts to lie or intimidate him.

Text.Value: Read the gnome's mind.
Leave, before I gut you like I gutted Mari and Barton.
That crypt's ours - we've got people guarding it! Tryin' to off us and swipe the loot, is it?

EditorData.NodeContext: Anger, with a little confusion. Assumes we're rivals trying to poach his loot.

Text.Value: What the - Who're you?! That crypt's ours; think you can clear it out from under our noses?

Synopsis: Right outside of the abandonned chapel of Selune you encounter a few bandits arguing among themselves. They are rightfully surprise to see you get out of the ruins and worried about the fate of their friend inside.
